title: Leprosy
body: Did you know that humans and armadillos are the only two species that can be affected by leprosy? I learned this from James Acaster on Taskmaster! Thank you, James

title: Bob's Egg
body: Speaking of Taskmaster contestants, Bob Mortimer once helped Damon Hill to win a Grand Prix by presenting him with a pre-race snack. The snack was a Scotch Egg.

title: The Russian
body: Tony said we need to find him before he goes back to his boss! He killed 17 Czechoslovakian, that guy! He was an interior decorator

title: How to find a New Yorker
body: Just ask a Baltimore question.. like, Who Young Leek be? Or the Big Phat Morning Show..
